fields.name: Dr. Strange
fields.description: Portrait of Benedict Cumberbatch as the Marvel wizard that is Dr. Strange. Created on an iPad with the Apple Pencil using Procreate. 8 hours of effort!!

fields.name: Scarlett Witch
fields.description: Elizabeth Olsen plays Scarlett Witch, one of the most powerful of the Avengers. A portrait drawn here on the iPad using the Apple Pencil

fields.name: Wonder Woman
fields.description: Gal Gadot as the incomperable Amazonian Warrior Wonder Woman of the DC Universe

fields.name: Yoga
fields.description: The one and only Yoda, the immensely powerful Jedi Master of the Star Wars Universe

fields.name: The Fear Within
fields.description: A ghostly apparition appeared at the foot of my bed in a dream, 4 hours later and a ball point pen and this was the result

fields.name: Venom
fields.description: The Symbiant villain that is Venom, Spiderman’s far out villain/hero of the Marvel Universe

fields.name: New York City
fields.description: A shot taken from atop the Empire State building looking downtown Manhattan

fields.name: Petri Pumpkin
fields.description: A pumpkin carved carefully and lit perfectly for the shot

fields.name: Twin Towers
fields.description: This photo was taken on the eve of the unforgettable in New York when the Twin Towers came down. I was downtown that day and took this photo before I climbed to the top to enjoy the view.

fields.name: Bad Company
fields.description: The brutal Krool Heart, leader of the Krools in the 2000AD creation Bad Company…..a truly menacing character

fields.name: Halo Jones
fields.description: The eponymous heroine is a highly sympathetic 50th-century everywoman, wonderfully created by Alan Moore and Ian Gibson of 2000AD comics

fields.name: Slaine
fields.description: Sláine is a wanderer who is banished from his tribe, the Sessair. He explores the Land of the Young (Irish: Tír na Nóg) with an unscrupulous dwarf called Ukko, fighting monsters and mercenaries.

fields.name: ET with Steven Spielberg
fields.description: Steven holding ET up for a game of the classic 80’s Pac-Man. ET dominated the movies in 1983/84 and still to this day has millions of views every year around Haloween

fields.name: Laurel & Hardy
fields.description: Laurel and Hardy were a comedy duo act during the early Classical Hollywood era of American cinema, consisting of Englishman Stan Laurel(1890–1965) and American Oliver Hardy (1892–1957).

fields.name: Obelix
fields.description: Obelix  is a cartoon character in the French comic book series Asterix He works as a menhir sculptor and deliveryman, and is Asterix’s best friend.

fields.name: Jungle Dusk
fields.description: Evening in the jungle as the sun plays havoc with the colours of the sky and clouds. Painted on the iPad using Apple Pencil and the app Procreate.

fields.name: Winter Lakeside
fields.description: The beautiful cold crispy morning being captured on the iPad with the app Procreate

fields.name: Bee Supper Time
fields.description: Captured with a 300mm Zoom lens on a macro setting using a Canon DS1200

fields.name: Full Moon Fever
fields.description: Shot in the Southern Hemisphere in Perth Australia. Camera mounted on a tripod with a remote to keep perfect steadiness

fields.name: Spider Mam
fields.description: a spider Mammy looking after her brood. Captured again on the macro setting mounted to a tripod for steadier action shots
